A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was beautiful. I laughed\, I cheered\, and I cried\, and I screamed. It was a wild ride of so many emotions with great characters. Props to Mark Hamill\, his performance was spectacular! It took risks and it was different from the original trilogy and there were so many twists and turns. I won't go into spoiler territory but I was shocked on multiple occasions. This is a very character driven story and I can see how some of the narrative flaws can turn some people off. I also know some people didn't care for the humor but for me nearly every joke landed. The contrast between the dramatic moments and the funny moments made both of them stronger! I absolutely LOVED the Last Jedi and I can't wait to see it again!
